bibl.title: Pherne and parapherna in the Documents of Augustus' Reign: On the Subject of P. Ryl. II 125 Once Again.
bibl.note: Réfute l'interprétation de P. Ryl. II, 125 proposée par: Tony REEKMANS, Treasure-Trove and Parapherna, Le monde grec. Hommages à Claire Préaux (Bruxelles, 1975) pp. 748-759.
bibl.seg: SÁNCHEZ-MORENO ELLART Carlos, Pherne and parapherna in the Documents of Augustus' Reign: On the Subject of P. Ryl. II 125 Once Again.
